project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the logic to read the text file and process the words
Count the frequency of each word in the text
Identify the top 10 most common words and their counts
Display the top 10 most common words in the terminal
Write tests for the implemented functionalities
Execute tests to ensure correct functionality of the program
